typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as date,
		StreamEnd as date,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FStoCuratedSource
FStoCuratedSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CuratedStreaming.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CuratedStreaming
